posts.post_title: FS: T206 Raw lower grade- Prices Lowered Sold!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tim Sanders
I'm looking to sell off a few cards.  I've often bought on the board but never sold so please be patient with me.  All cards are postage paid with insurance.  Paypal/Money Order/Checks are all fine with no fees.  These cards have seen better days (at least most of them):
First e-mail takes priority over posts - I'll warn you I have a very aggressive Spam Filter so please be patient with that as well.

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Raw lower grade- Prices Lowered Sold!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tim Sanders
John-
I am selling off a bunch of commons/stars but none of my HOFers.  I am just trying to raise money to make a few purchases while at the same time tightening up my collection to only include graded cards.  As far as Hal Chase being a Hall of Famer or not that is a question for the main board.  Thanks for the interest- I am also reducing the prices but feel free to make offers.
